page.title: 12 Our School.
page.content: Our school is Worlingham Middle School and it was built in 1971.There are about 380 pupils and about 20 teachers. We have 4 years,and 4 classes in each year.At the side of our school we have a big field and playground.There are several special rooms,the Music,room, the Staff room,Sci/tech area,Office, Hall,and cookery area plus more.We have a lot of different lessons.Here are most of them,Science,Maths,English, Humanities,Art,French,Cookery,P.E.and Music.School lasts from 9.00 to 3.45 with 2 breaks and a lunchtime.There are usually between 25 and 30 in a class. We have tests for English and Maths and when we are in the 4th year a French test.For most of the lessons we have different teachers but the teacher we see most is our class teacher.
